prefix: The Gentlemen Who Caf√© Present III
description: Almost four years later, here we were again. The Gentlemen back at The Coach and Four, Wilmslow. Where we belong. Where we will retire. We sort of forgot how much of a short drive this one was going to be compared to last time. I mean, a three-hour motorway drive is pretty much nothing compared to three hours of A82 then and hour of single track. Breezy. We had an excellent drive test running the Cheshire 2023 playlist, followed by a very successful first night. We hit a room desk with some Sainsbury's beers on offer. One of many advantages England has against us. We sit a Social Network in the room and later realised we passed out at 5am with Minecraft YouTube videos on. Sign of a very successful night. After some Casino Royale, ee went on our respective runs on Saturday then boosterino'd into the city centre on a beautiful day for the markets. Not before picking up a sad order of a Triple Mango and mini Jager from a questionable Spar. Although the Town Hall markets weren't open this year, we still got a decent browse of some stalls and outdoor shops. We got suited and bloody booted in the evening to finally hit a Smoke. Which was god-awful. And we were insulted for ordering the bottle of wine. Oh well, back to the room for more desk beers and wasted. Sunday was quiet. We ran a Booths Hale with Michael Michael and Eileen Michael and were then on our way back to project land.
